biotools.summary:
An integrated, customizable microbial genome evaluation and annotation pipeline.

Pipeline for major biological analyses.

MetaSanity v1.1.1 - 2020 version.

MetaSanity v1.1.1 provides a unified workflow for genome assessment and functional annotation that combines all outputs into a single queryable database – all within an easily distributed Docker image
